author: Santa Rosas Press Gazette
title: Ground News - Heavener, McKenzie excited about senior season and future as D-I athletes | Santa Rosa Press Gazette
text:
Summary by Santa Rosas Press Gazette But the present is what matters for now, and the two Pace standouts are focused on helping the Patriots to contend for a 6A state title one more time. Pace has been to the state final four three consecutive years, reaching the championship game last year where it lost 5-1 to Bartow. “We’re excited. We know we have a chance to go further than last year,” Heavener said. McKenzie echoed those thoughts. “We’re ready to play one more time with the gi… Share menu 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
